tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vr_game_id INT,
  graphics_quality VARCHAR(50),
  audio_settings VARCHAR(50),
  control_scheme VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    game_id UUID,
    vr_level INT,
    graphics_quality VARCHAR(50),
    control_scheme VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE game_settings (
    game_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    game_name VARCHAR(100),
    developers VARCHAR(100),
    release_date DATE,
    supported_vr_devices VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE user_profile (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    experience_level VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE game_preferences (
    pref_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES user_profile(user_id),
    game_title VARCHAR(255),
    graphic_settings VARCHAR(20),
    sound_settings VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE game_progress (
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES user_profile(user_id),
    game_title VARCHAR(255),
    current_level INT,
    last_checkpoint DATETIME
);

CREATE TABLE user_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES user_profile(user_id),
    game_title VARCHAR(255),
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    user_id INT,
    game_id INT,
    graphic_settings VARCHAR(255),
    control_settings VARCHAR(255),
    sound_settings VARCHAR(255)
);
